content: first work these stitches as a normal stitch but at the 2dccl and cut yarn 24 2dccl 12 ch2 space 12 ch1 space beginning with a slip knot on your hook to start a round ____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ design by © koernerklaus november 2019 no sale no uploading on social media no publishing of excerpts from the pattern copyright is mine round 5 with new color stand single_crochet in any ch2 space omitting the last 2 half_double_crochet close with a slip_stitch in top of beg ch2 single_crochet ch1 2 single_crochet in same chain space *fpsc around next cluster skip ch1 and cut yarn 84 half_double_crochet space fpsc around next cluster 2 single_crochet ch1 2 single_crochet in next ch2 space* repeat from * to * around omitting the last round 13 with new color stand single_crochet in second half_double_crochet of any 2 single_crochet ch1 2 single_crochet close with a slip_stitch in first single_crochet and cut yarn 2-half_double_crochet-group single_crochet in next 3 st *fptr around the top of picot 24 fpsc 48 single_crochet 12 ch1 space from round 7 skip next st now behind the fptr single_crochet in next 6 st* repeat from * to * around omitting the last 4 st close with round 6 skip all st from round 5 work behind in skip ch1 space a slip_stitch in first single_crochet and cut yarn 12 fptr 72 single_crochet from round 4 with new color stand double_crochet in any ch1 space from round 4 round 14 with new color stand double_crochet in any fptr *ch1 skip 1 st ch1 double_crochet twice in same chain space * ch1 double_crochet 3 times in next 2dccl in next st ch1 skip 1 st 3dccl in next st ch2 skip 1 st ch1 space* repeat from * to * around ch1 close with a 3trcl in next st ch2 3 times skip 1 st 3dccl in next st ch1 slip_stitch in first double_crochet and cut yarn 36 double_crochet 36 ch1 space skip 1 st 2dccl in next st ch1 skip 1 st double_crochet in next st should be a fptr half_double_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 4 st half_double_crochet in next st double_crochet in round 7 with new color stand double_crochet in chain space after join 2 double_crochet in next st* repeat from * to * around omitting the last double_crochet same chain space *picot skip next double_crochet 3 double_crochet in next chain space ch1 skip close with a slip_stitch in first double_crochet do not cut yarn next the last double_crochet single_crochet in ch1 space from round 5 directly below 12 3trcl 8 3dccl 8 2dccl 8 double_crochet 8 half_double_crochet 16 single_crochet 16 ch2 space and in front of your work ch1 back in round 6 skip ch1 space 16 ch1 space behind and the next double_crochet 3 double_crochet in next chain space* repeat from * to * around omitting the last 3 double_crochet close with invisible round 15 slip_stitch in next chain space ch2 your first half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in same join 12 picot 72 double_crochet
